{{ja-kanjitab|しょう|こく|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From [[小]] (''shō'', "small") + [[国]] (''koku'', "country," "nation," "state")

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しょうこく|kyu=小國}}

# [[small]] [[nation]], small [[country]], [[lesser]] [[power]]

====Compounds====
* [[弱小国]] (''jakushōkoku''): minor power
* [[小国寡民]] (''shōkoku-kamin''): small country with a small population
